flawed_nl_solution:
She reads 90-60=<<90-60=60>>60 pages in an hour.
She needs to read 210-90=<<210-90=120>>120 more pages.
For an additional 120 pages, she will need 120/60=<<120/60=2>>2 hours.
#### 2

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30, not 60. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
